sentences.sContent: He could draw men round him and keep them bound to him; while his powerful attraction was there, disruption was out of the question.
sentences.sCn: 他能够把人们吸引到他的周围而且保持他们的忠心；而他的强大吸引力所在之处，就不可能有分裂。

sentences.sContent: Shipping our television to the UK was out of the question—not only would it have been prohibitively expensive, it was unlikely to work here anyway.
sentences.sCn: 把我们的电视运到英国是绝对不可能的，不仅仅因为高昂的运输费用，还因为在这里它根本不能工作。

trans.tranCn: 不可能的；不值得讨论的
